snippet: The Aqualillies, a nationwide group of synchronized swimming troupes, have turned their sport into high-wattage entertainment.
abstract: Aqualillies, nationwide group of synchronized swimming troupes, have turned their sport into high-wattage entertainment, performing for a roster of celebrities and appearing on various television programs; starting in 2014, Aqualillies fitness classes will be offered in more cities, along with a fledgling instructor-certification program.
lead_paragraph: The Aqualillies, a nationwide group of synchronized swimming troupes, have turned their sport into high-wattage entertainment.

headline.main: The Aqualillies: In the Pool, Poetry in Motion
headline.print_headline: In the Pool, Poetry in Motion
